favourite.article: Praise the Lord for the Triune God has become the compound Spirit today! We need to experience this compound Spirit for God's building!
We have been enjoying this hymn with the chorus as "Oh, He's the Compounded Spirit in us!" -Greetings from the Church in Wickliffe
Hallelujah! for this wonderful spirit in us! We sang this today in our LTM. Friday is our LTM here in Bahrain. Amen!
This song caught my spirit my being because He is a wonderful Spirit in me. As a new person in the recovery that is helping to understand when I call "Lord Jesus" why my spirit springs.
Enjoying the wonderful Spirit in us!!!! College training 2015 Illinois ðŸ˜ƒ
Praise Him!! The Triune God is in us. Let us be under His Love.
OH, HE's The Wonderful SPIRIT - In us !!!!

Oh, He's the wonderful Spirit in us, He's the wonderful Spirit in us! God is in the Son, the Son's the Spirit nowâ€” He's the wonderful Spirit in us!
God our Savior is the wonderful in us. Amen.
